collision
Class Coll

java.lang.Object
  collision.Coll

public class Coll
extends java.lang.Object

Contains all collision methods

Author:
Andreas Roth

          Called upon a blobs collision, if it hits an enemy it deals dmg and if neccessary removes it.

static void npc()
          Changes value of Main.npc if player hits npc.
static void poison()
          Damages player if he's too close to poisonous trees
static void shop()
          Sets Main.shop = true if player in range

Method Detail

goal

public static boolean goal()
Tests collision between players and goal; good for while-loop.

Returns:
false if player hits goal , true else

npc

public static void npc()
Changes value of Main.npc if player hits npc.

shop

public static void shop()
Sets Main.shop = true if player in range

poison

public static void poison()
Damages player if he's too close to poisonous trees

coll

public static boolean coll(int[] tester,
                           int x,
                           int y)
Tests if one figure collides with another

Parameters:
tester - - testing figure
x - - pixels moved on x-axis
y - - pixels moved on y-axis
Returns:
false if collision, true else

blob_hit

public static void blob_hit(int[] spell,
                            int[] victim)
Called upon a blobs collision, if it hits an enemy it deals dmg and if neccessary removes it.

Parameters:
spell - - blob
victim - - figure hit by the blob

fireball_hit

public static void fireball_hit(int[] spell,
                                int[] victim)
Called upon a fireballs collision, if it hits a fox it deals dmg and if neccessary removes the fox.

Parameters:
spell - - fireball
victim - - figure hit by the fireball
